name: Red Dead Redemption: Liars and Cheats
name_original: Red Dead Redemption: Liars and Cheats
description:
Red Dead Redemption: Liars and Cheats is an action-shooter game developed by Rockstar San Diego. It came out on 21-09-2010. Rockstar Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Red Dead Redemption: Liars and Cheats on PlayStation 3.
